newsitem.title: MALAYSIA: Malaysia to start national housing company.
newsitem.headline: Malaysia to start national housing company.

text.p: Malaysia will set up a national housing company to accelerate the programme for low and medium-cost housing, Finance Minister Anwar Ibrahim said on Friday.

The company, which will have a start-up capital of 1.0 billion ringgit, would assist developers build more low and medium-cost houses and provide more opportunities for people to own houses, Anwar said when presenting the 1997 budget in parliament.
